channel.title: Project Universe the 317 server
channel.description:
[img]http://hitskin.com/themes/10/31/57/i_logo.png[/img]
[size=10pt]Project Universe[/size]
[i][shadow=red,left]Is it like the other 317 servers?[/shadow][/i] No this server will be the best 317 server in Moparscape history. We dont just put a simple 3-4 months work. This Project would take more than 6 months. It will have 508 textures and gs holding. And it will be hard as real Runescape to earn money and must make some quests + sounds. This server will not have any customs. The project will make the own base not using others base, the server gonna be coded from scratch.
[i][shadow=red,left]Where is the pictures?[/shadow][/i] There isn't pictures because I will not be in the team, coding. Because im not good at 317 servers, but i can add advanced stuff. The team will have 2 coders that will code the client + server from their own work.
What will the server has? [b]GS mini Working CC Working Ancient + Lunar mages Jad minigame Daganoth cave KQ KBD Working Rune Cbow Barrows Working Dbow Working Pest Control Working Clan Wars Some special quests you must clear to wear some stuff/items And alot more.[/b]
You can contact me at volkan_css@hotmail.com for more information. When someone made a application and i accept it, i will pm you the site. Its still under construction.
Yõur Mastér
[font=Verdana]Server progress 0%[/font]

Working Dbow[/quote]

item.title: Project Universe the 317 server

item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

i_logo.png1000×265

[size=10pt]Project Universe[/size]

[shadow=red,left]Is it like the other 317 servers?[/shadow]
No this server will be the best 317 server in Moparscape history. We dont just put a simple 3-4 months work. This Project would take more than 6 months. It will have 508 textures and gs holding. And it will be hard as real Runescape to earn money and must make some quests + sounds. This server will not have any customs. The project will make the own base not using others base, the server gonna be coded from scratch.

[shadow=red,left]Where is the pictures?[/shadow]
There isn’t pictures because I will not be in the team, coding. Because im not good at 317 servers, but i can add advanced stuff. The team will have 2 coders that will code the client + server from their own work.

What will the server has?

Working CC

Some special quests you must clear to wear some stuff/items
And alot more.

You can contact me at volkan_css@hotmail.com for more information. When someone made a application and i accept it, i will pm you the site. Its still under construction.
